title: Just hit 30, looking for chill people to play with

replies.body: Add me ingame, I play Supp as well and transferred from EUW so no one to play with, I can probably give you a few tips for supp as well.

Sup, add me in game I'll play some games, am on occasionally, am keen to find a group of chill guys to play with, would love to get back into a bit more LoL (Been playing since launch, but all my homies have quit / I lost my friends list when xfer from NA to OCE)

HERMESLAD I'm looking for a spicy ranked team
i mostly play {{champion:84}} and{{champion:12}} {{champion:31}}
